reasoning: This is a straightforward import/export mismatch bug. Only 2 files are involved (Icons.tsx and FlowsPage.tsx), within a single service. The fix will either add the missing EyeIcon export or correct the import to use an existing icon name. No external dependencies or infrastructure changes required.

scope.notes: Localized to Icons.tsx (provider) and FlowsPage.tsx (consumer). May need to verify no other files are affected if icon is renamed.

integrations.notes: No external integrations. Icons are internal UI components.

infrastructure.notes: Pure frontend code change with no infrastructure impact.

knowledge.notes: Icons.tsx already exports other icons - just need to follow existing pattern for EyeIcon.

concerns: Ensure fix doesn't break other imports from Icons.tsx
risk.notes: Low risk - adding or renaming an icon export is safe. Should verify no other files use the same incorrect import.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: Simple export fix with low risk. Minimal validation to verify the import resolves correctly and app compiles. No security implications from adding an icon export.
